org.apache.reef.runtime.common.evaluator.task

Class TaskRuntime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.reef.runtime.common.evaluator.task.TaskRuntime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public final class TaskRuntime
extends Object
implements Runnable
    The execution environment for a Task.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method needs to be called before a Task can be run(). It informs the Driver that the Task is initializing.

      • run

        public void run()
        Run the task: Fire TaskStart, call Task.call(), fire TaskStop.
        Specified by:

        Called by heartbeat manager
        Returns:
        current TaskStatusProto

      • hasEnded

        public boolean hasEnded()
        Returns:
        true, if the Task is no longer running, either because it is crashed or exited cleanly

      • getTaskId

        public String getTaskId()
        Returns:
        the ID of the task.

      • getId

        public String getId()

      • close

        public final void close(byte[] message)
        Close the Task. This calls the configured close handler.
        Parameters:
        message - the optional message for the close handler or null if there none.

      • suspend

        public void suspend(byte[] message)
        Suspend the Task. This calls the configured suspend handler.
        Parameters:
        message - the optional message for the suspend handler or null if there none.

      • deliver

        public void deliver(byte[] message)
        Deliver a message to the Task. This calls into the user supplied message handler.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be delivered.
